Package ohos.sysappcomponents.calendar

Class CalendarDataHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.sysappcomponents.calendar.CalendarDataHelper

  • public class CalendarDataHelper
extends Object
    Provides utilities for creating, adding, querying, modifying, and deleting calendar data.
    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CalendarDataHelper.InstancesDataHelper
      Provides utilities for operating calendar instance data in a certain period of time.

                         throws DataAbilityRemoteException

        Parameters:
        predicates - Indicates the conditions for querying the database.
        columns - Indicates the fields to obtain.
        Returns:
        Returns the calendar data.
        Throws:
        DataAbilityRemoteException - Throws this exception if a remote process exception occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • query

        public CalendarCollection query​(int id,
                                String[] columns)
                         throws DataAbilityRemoteException
        Queries calendar data in the database based on ID and columns.

        id has different representations in different tables.

        • In CalendarEntity, id represents the calendar ID.
        • In Events, id represents the account ID.
        • In Instances, id represents the event ID.
        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the ID to be used for query.
        columns - Indicates the fields to obtain.
        Returns:
        Returns the calendar data.
        Throws:
        DataAbilityRemoteException - Throws this exception if a remote process exception occurs.
        Since:
        3

      • insert

        public boolean insert​(ValuesBucket valuesBucket)
               throws DataAbilityRemoteException
        Inserts a calendar record into the database.
        Parameters:
        valuesBucket - Indicates the record to insert.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the record is inserted; returns false otherwise.
        Throws:
        DataAbilityRemoteException - Throws this exception if a remote process exception occurs.
        Since:
        3

               throws DataAbilityRemoteException

        Parameters:

      • delete

        public int delete​(DataAbilityPredicates predicates)
           throws DataAbilityRemoteException
        Deletes calendar data based on predicates.
        Parameters:
        predicates - Indicates the conditions used to delete calendar data. If this parameter is null, no record is deleted.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of records deleted.
        Throws:
        DataAbilityRemoteException - Throws this exception if a remote process exception occurs.
        Since:
        3

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns the number of records deleted.
